spell.basic-skill-sets.cleave.name: Cleave
spell.basic-skill-sets.cleave.descriptio: Cleave an area in front of you, dealing {damage} physical damage.
spell.basic-skill-sets.devastating_cut.d: Deal {damage} physical damage to enemies in an area in front of you, then immediately teleport forward a short distance.
spell.basic-skill-sets.flourish.name: Cleave
spell.basic-skill-sets.flourish.descript: Cleave an area in front of you, dealing {damage} physical damage.
spell.basic-skill-sets.knife_throw.name: Dagger Toss
spell.basic-skill-sets.knife_throw.descr: Throw your dagger forward, dealing {damage} physical damage to enemies hit.
spell.basic-skill-sets.skullcrusher.name: Skullcrusher
spell.basic-skill-sets.skullcrusher.desc: Bring your weapon down with a mighty downward heave, dealing {damage} physical damage in an area..
spell.basic-skill-sets.prepare.name: Impale
spell.basic-skill-sets.prepare.descripti: Get ready to impale the first enemy in an area in front of you, dealing {damage} to the enemies that walk in the area.
spell.basic-skill-sets.slam.name: Smite
spell.basic-skill-sets.slam.description: Bring down your weapon, dealing {damage_1} physical damage and {damage_2} holy damage in an area.
spell.basic-skill-sets.vaulting_slam.des: Vault into the air and slam the ground, dealing {damage} physical damage.
Assail nearby enemies with a series of whirling strikes, dealing {damage} dps for a short duration.
